    • Uses of VotesException in logic.impl

      Methods in logic.impl that throw VotesException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void VotesLogicImpl.deletePoll(long pollID, boolean asadmin)
      deletes a poll and cancels all timers which are possibly still associated with it
      void VotesLogicImpl.extendVotingPeriod(long pollID, java.util.Date newEndDate)
      extends the voting period of the poll by changing the end date and creating a new timer for the updated end date
      OrganizerTO VotesLogicImpl.getOrganizerByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      uses the username to check if the user is already in the database if not the user is persisted
      PollTO VotesLogicImpl.getPollByMasterToken(java.lang.String masterToken)
      returns the poll based on its masterToken The masterToken is used to publish the poll to all participants but without using the actual database id of the poll
      PollTO VotesLogicImpl.getPollByToken(java.lang.String tokenValue)
      returns the poll for a specific token
      void VotesLogicImpl.publishPoll(long pollID)
      sets the poll state to published if it was in state finished before
      void VotesLogicImpl.savePoll(PollTO pollTO)
      saves or edits a poll
      void VotesLogicImpl.startPoll(long pollID)
      starts a poll and creates timers for the PollState changes
      void VotesLogicImpl.submitVotes(java.util.List<ItemTO> items, java.lang.String tokenValue)
      increases the vote count for every option which is marked as voted and increases the abstentions count for every item which is marked as such.
